_sText:
This map is for Counter-Strike Source!!
------------------------------------------

BETA 2 RELEASED:
-----------------
Fixed Teleports
MAP NOW HAS JAIL


After creating the surf_lava pack three years ago as well as releasing surf_lava_reloaded 
all for the great mod PVKII (Pirates, Vikings, and Knights II), I now release 
surf_lava_remix for CS:S, with more ramps, areas, and a higher difficulty. I would not be 
able to create this conversion/remix without the permission of PVKII lead developer 
CrazyTalk, who gave me permission to use the lava texture thats in this map. 




surf_lava_remix CREDITS
-------------------------------------
Map by Banjo Boy
Skybox by hipshot & [-B-]
Lava texture by CrazyTalk and Jahhur
-------------------------------------

Make sure you type "sv_airaccelerate 100" into console before playing.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
PLEASE VISIT www.pvkii.com and download Pirates, Vikings, and Knights II today!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
